name: Lost In Failures
description:
Lost In Failures is an action, survival and adventure game set in a living, rich and challenging open world. In the work you control David, a character who had a normal life, but suddenly woke up on an unknown beach surrounded by a dense forest.



The region has many mysteries and enemies that will do whatever is necessary to kill you.



His goal is to regain his normal life, for this, he will have the help of Hades, a strange man who claims to have the answers to the problems David is facing.



The player will need to understand what is happening to the world around them, explore and fight with all their might to save your life!



The world of the work allows you to craft items and equipments, hunt various species of wild animals, explore caves and structures, invade enemy occupations, evolve the character's skills and much more.

Game mechanics:

  • Management of life, stamina, hunger and thirst;
  • Manufacture of items and equipment;
  • Fun and challenging combat;
  • Use and domestication of horses;
  • Animal hunting;
  • Construction of structures for the camp;
  • Evolution of skills.
